channel.title: css on Davide Vega D'Aurelio
channel.description: Recent content in css on Davide Vega D'Aurelio

item.title: Observing gender roles in mainstream TV shows
item.description: The power of mass media, such as TV shows, lies in their ability to influence our cultural and political ideas through the lens of their characters or the society they depict. In non-fictional dramas these representations can provide, for the most part and with some limitations, an accurate account of how a particular issue is perceived within a portion of the society. The goal of this project is to study how gender is represented in western TV shows.

item.title: Computational Analysis of Swedish Newspapers Using Topic Detection and Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Newspapers might report on the same event, say a sport event or a political statement, but since they most likely differ in the presentation, are the content and under laying message of the articles actually the same? A human can read two separate articles and determine if they touch similar subjects and if they approach the subject in a positive or negative way. If this comparison would be preformed over several thousand of articles a computer would very much be the preferred method.
